page.description: A SQL::ColumnValue specifies the name and value for a column.

parameter.name: IsNull
parameter.description: True if the column contains a null value

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: The unique name of the column to be indexed within the table.

parameter.name: Value
parameter.description: The actual data value. Note: This property will only contain valid data if the IsNull property value is false..

parameter.name: XML
parameter.description: The persisted XML string that describes the column.
